attributes.action: Ensure the greener future of Urban Mobility by legalising Electric Scooters.
attributes.additional_details:
I've been making YouTube videos on this subject for the past 7 months and what made me really spring into action was when people contacted me explaining they were unable to cycle for medical reasons and did not want to be in a wheelchair or use a mobility scooter - However they were able to use an electric scooter to get around independently.

The UK needs to join the rest of the world by legalising electric scooters and other portable e-vehicles to ensure a greener future of Urban Mobility.
attributes.background:
Global Action Plan found that London is the worst UK city for costs to the NHS from pollution from cars and vans, totalling £605m.  

To get people out of cars and off our strained public transport system we need to allow viable eco-friendly alternatives for people to get around.
